mapper.select: SELECT * FROM options WHERE optionNum IN (SELECT optionNum FROM product_options WHERE productNum=${productNum})
mapper.insert: INSERT into Options (optionKinds, optionName, optionPrice, step) VALUES (#{optionKinds},#{optionName},#{optionPrice},#{step})
